mapper.select: SELECT m1.module_code m1_module_code,m1.module_name m1_module_name, m2.module_code m2_module_code,m2.module_name m2_module_name, m3.module_code m3_module_code,m3.module_name m3_module_name, m3.link_url FROM sys_module m1 LEFT JOIN sys_module m2 ON m1.module_code = m2.parent_module LEFT JOIN sys_module m3 ON m2.module_code = m3.parent_module WHERE m1.module_code = '0101' AND m3.module_code IN (SELECT rf.module_id FROM sys_role_fun rf LEFT JOIN (SELECT sur.role_id FROM sys_user_role sur WHERE sur.user_id = #{userId}) AS a ON rf.role_id = a.role_id) ORDER BY m1_module_code,m2_module_code,m3_module_code

SELECT sr.role_code, sr.role_name, sr.role_desc,sr.role_order, sr.role_type FROM (SELECT role_id FROM sys_user_role WHERE user_id = #{suerId}) AS ri INNER JOIN sys_role AS sr ON sr.role_code = ri.role_id
